name: heppuppet-vosupport
summary: VO default definitions and setup tools
author: schwicke
description: This modules provides classes and definitions required to setup a list of supported VOs.

parameters.name: number
parameters.doc: number of pool accounts to be created

parameters.name: defaultgid
parameters.doc: default gid to be used if no gid set in the above array

parameters.name: uidmap
parameters.doc: map of pool account names to uid/gid pairs

providers.name: poolhome
providers.doc: ensure that pool home directories are present

types.name: poolhome
types.doc: ensure that the home directory exists and is owned by the right account

parameters.name: number
parameters.doc: number of pool accounts to be created

providers.name: gridmapdirentry
providers.doc: ensures that file entries for pool accounts are present in gridmapdir

types.name: gridmapdirentry
types.doc: ensures that file entries for pool accounts are present in gridmapdir
